item.title: SAUDI ARAMCO profit doubles on soaring oil prices...
item.description:
www.cnbc.com
Saudi Arabian oil giant Aramco reported blowout full-year earnings on Sunday, posting a more than doubling in year-on-year net profit to $110 billion.

item.title: Ukraine war backdrop in US push for hypersonic weapons...
item.description:
apnews.com
PORTLAND, Maine (AP) — Lagging behind Russia in developing hypersonic weapons, the U.S. Navy is rushing to field its first, with installation on a warship starting as soon as late next year. The United States is in a race with Russia and China to develop these weapons, which travel at speeds akin to ballistic missiles but are difficult to shoot down because of their maneuverability.

item.title: Afghanistan's last finance minister, now DC UBER driver...
item.description:
www.stripes.com
Until last summer, Khalid Payenda was Afghanistan's finance minister, overseeing a $6 billion budget. Now, seven months after Kabul fell to the Taliban, Payenda is an Uber driver in the Washington, D.C., metro region.

item.title: Outrage Over Vlad's $13,000 jacket, $12,000 watch, $800 sneakers...
item.description:

item.title: S Korea's next leader to abandon Blue House for new office...
item.description:
apnews.com
SEOUL, South Korea (AP) — South Korea’s incoming president said Sunday he will abandon the mountainside presidential palace of Blue House and establish his office at the Defense Ministry compound in central Seoul to better communicate with the public.

item.title: PUTIN GOES HYPERSONIC
item.description:
news.yahoo.com
Ukraine called on China on Saturday to join the West in condemning "Russian barbarism", as Moscow claimed it had struck a Ukrainian arms depot with hypersonic missiles in what would be the first use in combat of the next-generation weapons.

item.title: Moscow ridicules idea that cosmonauts wore yellow in support of Ukraine...
item.description:
news.yahoo.com
"Sometimes yellow is just yellow," Roscosmos's press service said on its Telegram channel. "The flight suits of the new crew are made in the colours of the emblem of the Bauman Moscow State Technical University, which all three cosmonauts graduated from ... To see the Ukrainian flag everywhere and in everything is crazy."

item.description:

Authorities in Miami Beach are saying a “silent prayer” as large spring break crowds once again pack South Beach a year after revelers overwhelmed the city and led police to call in a SWAT team to enforce its emergency curfew.

item.title: Overwhelmed prosecutors quitting in tears amid staffing crisis, NYC district attorneys say...
item.description:
sports.yahoo.com
Underpaid prosecutors overwhelmed by a mammoth backlog of cases are quitting in droves when their work is needed more than ever, the city’s district attorneys told the City Council on Friday. “Former staffers cited the responsibilities of discovery, managing the backlog of cases, and increased night and weekend shifts among the reasons why they leave,” Bronx District Attorney Darcel Clark told ...
